Windlord::


"Time comes that that Indiindividualistic streak could be our ruin, 
I'm afraid" replied Windlord "Those groups must be the begin of 
something... somthing bad or good, I don't sure... Time comes that we 
should choose to join a groups or made one if we want survive; but I 
would rather die alone if all those groups are like the two that I've 
met some days ago"



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He shrugs.  "I've been wrong before.  It happens.  Well... 
actually I 
> can't remember before but I imagine that I've been wrong."  He 
sighs again.  
> "I wish I had my memory back.  But I know what you mean about not 
wanting to 
> be pinned down.  That individualistic streak runs strong in us my 
friend, 
> very strong indeed."
